channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report E-2023100680
item.description:
Report E-2023100680

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO CNW, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Due to a forklift puncture during the loading process, the body of the drum became compromised and released approximately 8-gallons of product onto the trailer floor while in transit. A Contractor cleaned the released and transferred the remaining product into a new drum. The damaged, empty drum was overpacked for disposal. No storm drains, waterways, or soil were impacted.

item.title: Report X-2023100230
item.description:
Report X-2023100230

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-01T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-24
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: UNLOAD DILIVERED THE LEAKING HAZMAT BOX WAS OPENED AND OBSERVED THERE WAS A LOOSE CAP CAUING THE SPILLAGE CAP WAS TIGHTENED AND TRANFERED TO A HAZMAT DRUM DescribePack: LOOSE CAP CAUSED THE SPILLAGE DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: CAP WAS TIGHTENED AND TRANSFERED TO A HAZMAT DRUM

item.title: Report X-2023100229
item.description:
Report X-2023100229

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-24
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking and removed from sortation, then brought to QA. DescribePack: One bottle was missing its cap, and was almost empty. No inner packing. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a spill bin and brought to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023100195
item.description:
Report X-2023100195

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHEN PACKAGE ARIVED IN THE QA BOX WAS WET DUE TO A LOOSE CAP BOTTLES WERE TRANSFERED TO A HAZMAT DRUM DescribePack: 1 OF THE 4 BOTTLES HAD A LOOSE CAP CAUSING THE BOX TO GET WET DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ALL CAPS WERE TIGHTENED AND TRASFERED TO A HAZMAT DRUM
